医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现免疫疗法可显着提高晚期肺癌患者的生存率自2015年美国推出第一种增强人体针对晚期肺癌免疫反应的免疫治疗药物以来，该病患者的生存率显着提高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-survival-rates-for-advanced-lung-cancer-患者-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-survival-rates-for-advanced-lung-cancer-患者-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db8abb1d-8d8a-42bf-97b5-f6b43b4d9a95 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 14:14:56 -0400 Immunotherapy significantly improves survival rates for advanced lung cancer patients, study finds
新研究揭示了异基因造血细胞移植后成功怀孕的希望一项新的国家多中心研究为接受同种异体造血细胞移植（alloHCT）的女性带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-study-reveals-hope-for-successful-pregnancies-post-allogeneic-hematopoietic-cell-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-study-reveals-hope-for-successful-pregnancies-post-allogeneic-hematopoietic-cell-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7900efb0-5d64-4a5a-8f94-f0e9fa4422e6 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 14:11:38 -0400 New study reveals hope for successful pregnancies post-allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation
加州大学洛杉矶分校启动针对侵袭性儿童脑癌疫苗的突破性临床试验为了对抗最致命的儿童脑癌之一，加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员正在启动一项首个临床试验，以评估针对 H3 G34 的癌症疫苗的安全性和有效性-突变型弥漫性半球神经胶质瘤，一种高度侵袭性的脑肿瘤，通常见于青少年和年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/UCLA-launches-groundwriting-clinical-trial-for-vaccine-targeting-aggressive-pediatric-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/UCLA-launches-groundwriting-clinical-trial-for-vaccine-targeting-aggressive-pediatric-brain-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30df6585-e6f6-4a64-b5d1-648819523664 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:54:29 -0400 UCLA launches groundbreaking clinical trial for vaccine targeting aggressive pediatric brain cancer
研究显示执法人员头部受伤和心理健康问题的比例很高一项新的研究首次揭示了在脑震荡监测方面以前被忽视的人群（执法人员）中头部受伤和相关心理健康症状的高发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-reveals-high-rate-of-head-injuries-and-mental-health-issues-in-law-enforcement-officers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-reveals-high-rate-of-head-injuries-and-mental-health-issues-in-law-enforcement-officers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99abea1f-887e-486e-a817-4ff7e8269dc0 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:38:12 -0400 Study reveals high rate of head injuries and mental health issues in law enforcement officers
新型双用途造影剂彻底改变了 PET 和 MRI 集成以增强诊断布拉格 IOCB 的一个研究小组与德国蒂宾根大学和查尔斯大学理学院合作，开发了一种新型造影剂，可用于磁共振成像 (MRI) 和正电子发射断层扫描（PET）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-dual- Purpose-contrast-agent-revolutionizes-PET-and-MRI-integration-for-enhanced-diagnosis-A-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-dual- Purpose-contrast-agent-revolutionizes-PET-and-MRI-integration-for-enhanced-diagnosis-A-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc04152-22d2-46af-b9a3-c1d087169cef Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:30:00 -0400 New dual-purpose contrast agent revolutionizes PET and MRI integration for enhanced diagnosis
研究称生活质量测量对于癌症护理至关重要随着新的癌症治疗方法不断出现，收集有关患者生活质量以及治疗如何延长生存期的数据至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Quality-of-life-measurements-is-essential-in-cancer-care-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Quality-of-life-measurements-is-essential-in-cancer-care-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca5585d-3758-4ef1-9acf-02c807eb6de4 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:26:00 -0400 Quality-of-life measurements are essential in cancer care, study says
筛查争论：没有足够的证据支持对非吸烟者进行肺癌筛查肺癌仍然是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因。在早期阶段检测到这种疾病可显着提高生存率，使低剂量 CT 筛查成为对抗肺癌的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Screening-debate-Insufficient-evidence-to-support-lung-cancer-screening-for-non-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Screening-debate-Insufficient-evidence-to-support-lung-cancer-screening-for-non-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc067da-44a0-4c86-ae65-817fa727f56b Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:17:33 -0400 Screening debate: Insufficient evidence to support lung cancer screening for non-smokers
桑德斯-布朗老龄化中心推出新计划，以促进痴呆症患者和护理人员的大脑健康肯塔基大学桑德斯-布朗老龄化中心推出了一项开创性的计划“大脑健康活动”，旨在支持痴呆症患者及其护理人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Sanders-Brown-Center-on-Aging-unveils-new-program-to-boost-brain-health-for-dementia-病人-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Sanders-Brown-Center-on-Aging-unveils-new-program-to-boost-brain-health-for-dementia-病人-caregivers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b1ca47a-91d7-4840-b290-4a8f5671e35d Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:13:56 -0400 Sanders-Brown Center on Aging unveils new program to boost brain health for dementia patients, caregivers
研究发现，社区咖啡馆可改善粮食不安全人群的饮食质量近年来，粮食不安全的发生率显着增加，这促使人们需要创新项目，例如采用按需付费系统的社区咖啡馆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Community-cafes-improve-diet-quality-for-food-insecure-populations-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Community-cafes-improve-diet-quality-for-food-insecure-populations-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc683ce0-46ee-46d1-8560-0a50b09efa48 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:10:00 -0400 Community cafés improve diet quality for food-insecure populations, study finds
蜂蜜可提高酸奶中益生菌的存活率如果您早上喜欢喝一碗原味酸奶，那么添加一勺蜂蜜是让您最喜欢的早餐变甜的美味方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Honey-enhances-probiotic-survival-in-yogurt.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Honey-enhances-probiotic-survival-in-yogurt.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cae96e2d-0264-4e4b-bace-ebb690ac01ed Mon, 05 Aug 2024 13:03:00 -0400 Honey enhances probiotic survival in yogurt
